d.Name: BNT_GLOBAL_P2P_COUPA
d.Description:
This package contains interfaces between S/4HANA and Coupa.

  • IF1083 - S/4 Inbound Orders from Coupa
  • IF1084 - Goods Movements from Coupa to S/4HANA
  • IF1109 - S/4 Inbound Order changes from Coupa
  • IF1110 - S/4 Inbound Goods Reversal from Coupa
  • IF1111 - S/4 Outbound Supplier master to Coupa
  • IF1112 - S/4 Outbound WBS element master to Coupa
  • IF1162 - S/4 Outbound Goods Movements to Coupa
  • IF1163 - S/4 Outbound IDoc Status to Coupa
  • IF1169 - S/4 Outbound Vendor invoices to Coupa including a scanned invoice
  • IF1183 - S/4 Outbound Cost Center to Coupa
